body: Nice OC's, but I don't see how this is connected to Black Rock shooter, unless you are saying this is strength from the anime, which it isn't as they don't have the same eyes and the original had metal hands(not gloves, her arm cuts of to metal that is impossible to fit a hand in). As a huge Black Rock shooter fan, I would be glad if set it as oc then fill the page with characters not from the anime
The one who translated this definitely only cared about the loli....xD
